short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Takes the URL of the currently opened tab to search a belonging podcast episode on fyyd.de. Click the extension's icon!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: fyyd.de is a podcast search engine and directory. This extension checks, if the url of the currently opened tab is a page to a podcasts episode and opens the corresponding page on fyyd.de, where you can use all the tools to curate and collect episodes and podcasts.
